long_description: The men's Marmot Variant Vest offers warmth and stretch for climbing excursions, ski trips or other cold-weather adventures where core protection is key. Front contains Thermal R(TM) synthetic insulation that offers warmth, low bulk, excellent packability and insulates even if wet. Ripstop-nylon shell fabric over the insulated panels features a durable water repellent finish to bead up water so it rolls off. Back is made of soft Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) for breathable mobility and warmth. Stretchy, close-fitting armholes and an elastic drawcord hem help seal in warmth. Soft fleece collar lining and chin guard feel nice next to your neck and chin. Marmot Variant Vest for men has zippered hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Marmot Variant Vest offers warmth and stretch for climbing excursions, ski trips or other cold-weather adventures where core protection is key.
